trans-unit.source: Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET and must have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Adapters zijn meestal automatisch samengesteld door ASP.NET en moeten een standaardconstructor hebben.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.

trans-unit.source: Source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: Bron-id voor de gebeurtenis.

trans-unit.source: Argument identifier for the event.

trans-unit.source: Collection of postback data from the request object.
trans-unit.target: Verzameling van terugposten gegevens uit het request-object.

trans-unit.source: A modified version of the baseCollection parameter.
trans-unit.target: Een aangepaste versie van de baseCollection parameter.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: Evalueert of de set van een apparaatadapter voor de opgegeven aanvraag geldt.

trans-unit.target: Deze API is verouderd.

trans-unit.source: |Class|Returns|Preferred rendering type|Check value of JavaScript property| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The device capability of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|N/A|
trans-unit.target: | Klasse | Retourneert | Type rendering voorkeur | Controleer de waarde van eigenschap JavaScript | |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Controleert of de waarde van de <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>of <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. | Retourneert de <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> `true`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Controleert of de <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>of <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. | Retourneert de mogelijkheden van apparaten van de <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> `false`. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Controleert of de <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>of <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>. | N/A|</xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.target: De huidige aanvraagcontext.

trans-unit.source: Renders a reference to a postback event appropriately for the target device.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee maakt u een verwijzing naar een gebeurtenis terugposten op de juiste manier voor het doelapparaat.

trans-unit.source: Renders the header associated with postbacks.
trans-unit.target: Geeft de header terugpostacties gekoppeld.

trans-unit.source: For browsers that support script, this includes a script block to perform postback.
trans-unit.target: Dit omvat voor browsers die ondersteuning bieden voor script, een scriptblok zijn opgegeven om uit te voeren terugposten.
